short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An interface to various web caches or archivers (Google, Bing, Wayback Machine, archive.is). You can add another providers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To show the menu with the list of web caches:

* Click the extension's icon in the browser toolbar next to the URL bar.
* Right-click on a link.
* Select text that resembles a URL on a web page, then right-click.

The extension is open-source and does not send your data anywhere.
